description:
Description


A spot-caring ampoule helps soothe and improve troubled skin for achieving a clear and healthy-looking complexion.
Formulated with 3-Sprout Complex for maintaining the oil-water balance of the skin and controlling sebum production to prevent excessive sebum formation which may lead to skin inflammation and acne formation.
Contains patented ingredients Diarte and Coolif to provide instant calming and cooling effects for stabilizing irritated skin and lowering skin temperature.
Effectively reduces blemish and redness with minimal irritation to sensitive skin.
Replenishes deep hydration to dry skin with 3 types of Hyaluronic Acid.
 
How To Use

1. After cleansing your skin, prep your skin with toner.

2. Pour a moderate amount onto a cotton pad and place it onto your skin for 5-10 minutes.

3. Gently wipe your skin with the cotton pad to enhance better absorption with the residue.

4. Apply essence and face cream afterward to end your skincare routine.
 
Key Ingredients

Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Tripropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Allantoin, Decyl Glucoside, Arginine, Carbomer, Disodium EDTA, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Artemisia Annua Extract, Cymbopogon Citratus Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Mentha Arvensis Extract, Erythritol , Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sprout Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Germ Extract, Phaseolus Radiatus Sprout Extract, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Sprout Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Sprout Extract, Gluconolactone, Salicylic Acid, Succinic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate

description:
Description
WHAT IT IS Just 1 minute, in your morning & night cleansing routine. The moment you rinse it off, dead skin, sebum, and acne-causing bacteria get washed away. Succinic Acid, a natural ingredient extracted from amber and a highly concentrated acid complex, cleans your skin's impurities from deep within skin crevices and pores. This polishes your skin and creates a skin environment that prevents future breakouts. After use, rough skin texture is immediately improved and transformed into healthy, glowing skin.WHY IS IT SPECIAL Acne Cleansing Booster Serum Fix your everyday skin concerns by simply cleansing. After cleansing, apply the Cleansing Booster Serum to your slightly damp face and wait for one minute. The moment you wash it off, your skin concerns disappear, helping you regain your confidence. 21% Succinic Acid & Lactic Acid & Salicylic Acid Medicube’s 21% formulation of ”Spirit of Amber", which has been used as a cosmetic elixir for thousands of years, and a chemical exfoliant that helps improve problematic skin. 21% of acid ingredients help remove sebum and dead skin in pores and skin crevices. It dissolves dead skin to accelerate the skin-clearing cycle and helps soothe acne-prone skin. Our formulation has been developed to minimize irritation by combining Medicube's patented soothing ingredients (Hydra CalmTM & Derma-CleraTM) so that it’s safe for sensitive skin and acne-prone skin. Medicube works to be sustainable 21% Red Succinic Acid Cleansing Booster Serum was manufactured using soy ink under FSC certification. The box and the package are both recyclable.
How To UseWhen first trying the product, it is recommended to use it once or twice a week for one minute. The frequency of use can be gradually increased depending on the skin condition. 1. After cleansing, lightly pat your skin dry. 2. Apply 2 drops of product on the entire face or on the areas of concern and leave it for 1 minute. Gently massage onto face with fingers. 3. After 1 minute, rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. After cleansing, apply the skincare you normally use to prevent the skin from drying out. 
Tip! 21% Red Succinic Acid Cleansing Booster Serum is made with highly concentrated acid. If your skin is sensitive to acids or not accustomed to highly concentrated acid products, perform a patch test on the forearm or behind your ear before using the product. 
Easier and faster ways to use it daily: 1. Pour 700ml of lukewarm water in the sink and apply a drop of 21% Red Succinic Acid Cleansing Booster Serum. 2. Wash your face by lightly splashing the water diluted with the product.

reviews.title: [MEDICUBE] Red Acne Succinic Acid Peel
reviews.content: The Medicube Red Acne Succinic Acid Peel is an effective treatment designed to target acne and prevent future breakouts. Formulated with succinic acid, it gently exfoliates the skin, removing dead cells and unclogging pores. This peel helps to reduce inflammation and redness, promoting a clearer, smoother complexion. Ideal for sensitive skin, it minimizes irritation while delivering powerful results. Regular use helps to balance oil production and improve skin texture, making it a great choice for those struggling with acne-prone skin.

description:
Description

Unlike some exfoliating gels/creams that are harsh on the skin and strips moisture away, iUNIK Lime Moisture Mild Peeling Gel uses AHA fruits complex to gently exfoliate with minimum irritation while providing moisture.
Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs), are a class of chemical compounds that consist of a carboxylic acid substituted with a hydroxyl group on the adjacent carbon. AHAs can reduce signs of s and smoothens the uneven skin.
Key ingredients: AHA & MultiEx BSASM. AHA is the exfoliating acid that is included in this peeling gel. MultiEx BSASM is a blend of seven natural extracts, which are Centella Asiatica Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, and Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.
Use at night. Dispense a suitable amount and gently massage over face and rinse with lukewarm water. Start using it once a week and slowly increase up to 2-3 times a week. Do not over exfoliate.

description:
Description

Facial exfoliation + moisture supply

It is a hypoallergenic peeling gel that does not put any strain on the skin. 


You can easily remove waste and dead skin cells in pores.



Heels + keep smooth

If the dead skin cells are very severe, it is recommended to use after physical removal. 


You can use it every day to provide thorough foot care.



Dark pearl curls + exfoliation of knees


By consistently managing the dead skin cells on your elbows and knees where there is a lot of friction, we keep your dull and rough skin texture clean and soft.
 
How To Use
Take a sufficient amount of gel, apply evenly to the wet face.
Gently massage the face in circular motions from the inside out until the gel turns into white gum.
Finally, rinse with water or Facial Cleanser.
Use 1-2 times/week depending on skin condition

description:
Description


It is a sebum control essence that quickly became the best-selling product upon its release.
It quickly reached the top ranking in sales at Olive Young within a day of its launch.
It deeply cleanses clogged pores and dissolves excessive sebum, leaving the skin soft and smooth.
Experience the refreshing feeling of a pore-cleansing treatment with the Super Melting Serum Softener.
This product uses ilso’s sebum management method, which melts and removes hardened sebum like scaling, creating clean and refreshed pores.
It helps remove sebum using scientific pH principles and aids in sebum circulation.
The sebum irritation test has been completed.
The SEBUM REMOVE COMPLEX, which is composed of ingredients such as Squalane and Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, helps with sebum management by preventing oxidation.
It also contains a fruit complex (Malus Domestica Fruit Extract, Prunus Mume Fruit Extract, Papain, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract) for gentle exfoliation and flexibility of the skin.
The addition of ingredients like Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, and Houttuynia Cordata Extract soothe the skin and provide gentle care for sebum.

description:

- This gentle exfoliating gel contains LHA and heartleaf extract, which remove dead skin cells and impurities while soothing skin for a smooth finish. - The product also contains peeling ingredient LHA, which is safe for sensitive skin. It contains BioDtox (Aloe Ferox Leaf Extract, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Extract and Bioflavonoids) to remove dead skin inside pores and create a smooth surface.

description:
Description


Dokdo Peeling Gel provides gentle and ideal treatment for eliminating dead skin cells, ensuring a perfectly hydrated peeling experience with the benefits of 8 variants of Hyaluronic Acid.

-Delivering a smooth double exfoliation effect through the gentle Hatching EX-07 and the synergy of cellulose components, it enhances skin texture, while being gentle on the skin.

- Say goodbye to harsh exfoliants! Our formula, 8 types of Hyaluronic Acid of varying sizes, deeply hydrates and moisturizes your skin, leaving it even more supple after exfoliation.

- Soothing care for tired and irritated skin: Panthenol, Allantoin, and DPG ingredients, which effectively soothe the skin, calm and comfort the skin irritated by external environments.

- Soft and moist gommage type: It is a moisturizing gommage type that gently adheres to the skin and helps with exfoliating without irritation.

- With patented mineral water manufacturing technology such as membrane filters, Dokdo Peeling Gel's deep sea water contains a high concentration of 72 types of naturally-derived minerals (magnesium, calcium, zinc) to help maintain moisture balance.

How To Use
After washing your face, wipe away the excess water and apply an adequate amount to your entire face, excluding the eyes and mouth area, then softly roll and massage before thoroughly rinsing.

* Tips
Cooling effect: Keep the peeling pack refrigerated to step up the cooling and calming effect for inflamed skin.

description:
Description

A 10% PHA gel-water peel which gently exfoliates the skin and clears the pores to reveal rejuvenated skin. 
With the extracts of 5 different fruits and vegetables, this peel soothes and clears the skin from the first use. 
Extracts of Cucumber, Papaya, and Centella Asiatica nourish the skin for a healthy glow.

Suggested Use

1. After cleansing, apply a thick even layer onto dry skin. 
2. Allow it to sit for 10 to 15 minutes. 
3. Rinse with lukewarm water.

description:
Description

Frudia Green Grape Pore Peeling Pad is formulated for melting away impurities and dead skin cells that clog pores to keep the skin texture smooth and soft. It is enriched with a green grape extract which is rich in tannin and prevents the secretion of excessive sebum, and thoroughly tightens pores. It is rich in antioxidants which heals sunburn and sun damage. Hypoallergenic formula with pH is similar to the skin’s acidity balances to create healthy skin. The big size pad is also available for exfoliation of the back and the knee areas. This Green Grape Pore Peeling Pad from Frudia is perfect for all skin types (combination, dry, normal, and oily). It is perfect for all skin concerns like blackheads, dryness, enlarged and clogged pores.

How To Use

1. After cleansing your face, use the embossed side of the pad to wipe off the entire face except for around the eyes gently.  
2. Use the smooth side on the other side to arrange your skin more along with skin texture 
3. Store it with the lid sealed so that the pad does not dry later using and finish with skincare product


 Ingredients

Water, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Methylpropanediol, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Propanediol, Betaine Salicylate, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyquaternium-51, Tannic Acid, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Disodium EDTA, Chlorphenesin, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Juniperus Virginiana Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Leaf/Nut/Stem Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange ) Peel Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Limonene, Linalool

description:
Description

-Sweep impurities away & Light up your skin
-Gentle low pH peeling gel enriched with naturally derived ingredients to improve skin condition.
-Dissolve dead skin cells with PHA & Hydrate with Hyaluronic Acids
-Easy to use with effective results

Suggested Use

1.After cleansing, apply onto damp skin.
2.Gently massage the skin with fingertips, while avoiding the eye area.

description:
Description
A easy-to-use, soft exfoliating pads that offer all the benefits of home peeling in one set. It provides gently yet effective exfoliation of dead skincells and impurities and lifting of saggin skin, leaving skin smoother, brighter and tighter.
Wash Off Mask that Reinforces the Skin Barrier to Tighten and Strengthen Loose Pores while 
Delivering Moisture, Refreshing the Pores, and Neutralizing the PoresSuggested Use
After cleansing, remove moisture then softly wipe from bottom to top, toward 
outside of entire face & neck with 1 pcs of peeling pad. 
After using gaze peeling side then lightly padding with embossing side and wash with lukewarm water. 

STEP 1 Insert your finger between gauze peeling pad side and embossing side. 
Use 1 pcs for a day. 

STEP2 Try with the gauze peeling side first. Wipe softly. Mesh gauze neatly remove the dead skin cells 
STEP3 Try with the embossing side with gently pressure. It removes perfectly the remain waste. Wash with lukewarm water.

reviews.title: Great Chemical Exfoliator
reviews.content: These are great to pack for travel. Plus they smell great and are fun and easy to use. My first time to use a chemical exfoliator and they are gentle and not harsh on my skin. My skin feels smooth and supple after using. Will definitely be repurchasing these again.

reviews.title: Great, gentle exfoliator but beware of the alcohol…
reviews.content: I thought this one had the renewed formula that is alcohol free and safe for fungal acne, but unfortunately it isn’t. So if you have sensitive skin or are prone to fungal acne, you may want to test first to see if you can tolerate the formula and wash off the product residue well after exfoliating. It still works for me, just need to be more cautious. If you don’t have any concern with any of the ingredients, this will work great for you.

description:
Description

Excellent Moisturization & Exfloation
Moisturizing peeling gel gently exfoliates, revealing smoother, moisturized skin
1. In- depth moisture.
2. Gentle rolling.
3. Removal of impurities and dead skin cells.
4. Stronger skin barrier.

Recommended for those whose:
- Skin is flaky and flawless makeup application is desired.
- Excessive production of sebum results in skin troubles.,/br>
- Skin becomes red and stings after exfoliation.
- Skin becomes dry and whose dead skin cells build up.


Suggested Use

1. Squeeze a proper amount on your palm after toweling dry hair and washing face.
2. Spread it evenly, covering the entire face except around the eyes.
3. Massage it gently with your fingers into the skin in a circular motion, then rinse with warm water.

description:
Description
Make  pack and cleanser in ONE! PORE DEEP CLEANSING! Powerful waste absorption of 100% Canadian Glacial Soil, Perfect skin cleansing with freshness of carbonic capsule!
1. Cleansing
Over 40 kinds of mineral ingredient in Canadian glacial clay absorbs the residue of make-up, waste and helps to do deep cleansing. It keeps skin pure and clean.
2. Pore care
Carbonic acid capsule shakes pores lightly and helps to move waste out in pores. It also helps to reduce the depth of pores.
3. Exfoliating
Soft bubble meets carbonic acid and they rise on skin. It removes the waste absorbed in glacial clay and dead skin cells, improves skin to be glow and smooth.
4. Calming
Carbonic acid makes circulation of oxygen for skin smooth and brings vitality to tired skin. It calms sensitive skin and presents comfort and softness to skin after cleansing. 
 
Suggest Use

1. Dispense an appropriate amount onto dry face such as 1mm thickness and spread into entire face. (You can also use directly over makeup.)
2. Leave about 5 min. to let glacial soil & carbonic acid capsule could fully absorb the waste of pores.
3. After 5 min. add the lukewarm water then softly massage with bubbles & rub bubbles softly  on entire face and wash with water then dry with a clean towel

Active Ingredients
Canadian Colloidal Clay, Carbonated Water, Kaolin, Centella asiatica, Cacao extract, Lotus extract, Rice bran extract

reviews.content: This is a good product it worked great with my oily skin and had really factors.Purchased this and other items from the range as gifts. They arrived promptly, gift packaging was great, and the products are wonderful.Beautiful natural oil. I have been using this in the day and the rosehip one at night and given up on makeup! My skin feels amazing. I love that these are plastic free in their little metal bottles. I sourced them out specifically for that - bonus is that the oil and the company is lovely too. The only thing was, if you're looking for plastic free, they come with a plastic pump too which I wasn't expecting (though in hindsight I think it does say this in the listing) however it is useful and when I re-order I will just request now not to send one in my next order and reuse the ones I have. Product is brilliant, I would highly recommend' Sarah, England

product_name: *TIMEDEAL*  Super Aqua Ultra Hyalron Peeling Gel 100ml
description:
Description


An exfoliationg gel formulated with naturally-derived cellulose that helps remove dead skin cells and impurities to reveal a radiant, smoother, and translucent complexion.
Formulated with 10 types of hyaluronic acids, this exfoliating gel gives a burst of moisture while you cleanse the skin.
Brightening Complex helps brighten the dull complexion.
Skin-friendly ingredients help soothe and protect skin.
A cocktail of Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Lime Fruit Extract, Lemon Fruit Extract, Apple Fruit Extract, Grape Fruit Extract, and Orange Fruit Extract.

Suggested Use

Take after cleansing, a small amount of peeling on your dry hands and spread it on your dry face by avoiding the eye and lip area.
Gently massage your face now circular, so dead skin cells and impurities are released.
Wash your face then with lukewarm water. Recommended 1-2 times per week.
